           <label for="searchText10101170">

           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>

       <div id="wrapbox17025720">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17025720">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17025720">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17025720">
          <div id="boxatt17025720" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20072123">
              <a id="link_20072123" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20072123,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20119218">
              <a id="link_20119218" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20119218,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Newly revised and online, well-respected resource complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

       <div id="wrapbox17025722">

          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17025722">
          <div id="boxatt17025722" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20074914">
              <a id="link_20074914" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20074914,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25526661">
              <a id="link_25526661" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25526661,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20072126">
              <a id="link_20072126" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20072126,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25526851">
              <a id="link_25526851" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;AN=14310354&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25526851,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25526851}); ">
               sample article
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Assessing a Journal
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22074913">
          <div id="boxatt22074913" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25526662">
              <a id="link_25526662" href="http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25526662,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974165}); ">
               UlrichsWeb Periodicals Directory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is peer-reviewed or not, on international periodicals. It covers all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17025724">
          <div id="boxatt17025724" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20072128">
              <a id="link_20072128" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20072128,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20072128}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20072129">
              <a id="link_20072129" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20072129,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20072129}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20072130">
              <a id="link_20072130" href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20072130,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental History of Latin America and the Caribbean', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20072130}); ">
               Annotated Bibliography Samples
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's Online Writing Lab for a definition and examples of an annotated bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>

      </a>
